definition: abbr. for 朝鮮|朝鲜[Chao2 xian3] Korea
imperial or royal court/government/dynasty/reign of a sovereign or emperor/court or assembly held by a sovereign or emperor/to make a pilgrimage to/facing/towards

sentences.english: Most Zainichi remove themselves from the North Korean regime as much as they can.
sentences.chinese: 大部分在日朝鲜人使自己离朝鲜政权越远越好。

sentences.english: North Koreans keep on wading the Tumen River.
sentences.chinese: 不过朝鲜人并未被吓阻，他们继续涉过图们江。

sentences.english: During the year reports suggested that the number of North Koreans in northeastern China declined.
sentences.chinese: 这一年有报告显示朝鲜人到中国东北的人减少了。

sentences.english: Has that North Korean citizen enter the Visa Office of the South Korean Embassy?
sentences.chinese: 那名朝鲜人是否已进入韩国使馆领事部？

sentences.english: But the North Koreans know how to deal with a frontal assault.
sentences.chinese: 但是朝鲜人懂得如何消解正面的攻势。

sentences.english: Obama and Lee can raise the profile on human rights.
sentences.chinese: 奥巴马和李可以提高世界对朝鲜人权问题的瞩目。

sentences.english: Like the rest of us, Koreans live in interesting times.
sentences.chinese: 就像余下的我们，朝鲜人生活在一个有趣的时代。

sentences.english: Like most Korean residents of Japan, he didn't have Japanese citizenship.
sentences.chinese: 就像大部分在日朝鲜人一样，郑大世没有日本国籍。

sentences.english: North Koreans stroll along the Taedong River in Pyongyang, North Korea.
sentences.chinese: 朝鲜人在平壤的大同江边散步。

sentences.english: North Koreans make pilgrimages to the mountain, and students march up its summit singing songs.
sentences.chinese: 朝鲜人来到这座山上朝觐，学生们爬上山顶歌唱。

sentences.english: Yalu River boat tours are the most popular means of gazing at North Korea—and North Koreans.
sentences.chinese: 船游鸭绿江是远观朝鲜景色和朝鲜人最常用的方式。

sentences.english: Many of whom try to escape the country by crossing the river into China.
sentences.chinese: 很多朝鲜人试图通过渡过图门江进入中国而逃离朝鲜。

sentences.english: A North Korean, with a bouquet of artificial flowers, joins the ceremony celebrating the departure of the cruise ship.
sentences.chinese: 一个朝鲜人拿着一束鲜花参加游轮的出航意识。

sentences.english: And, like many zainichi, he grew up identifying with the North Korean regime.
sentences.chinese: 和很多在日朝鲜人一样，朝鲜政权的影响伴随他成长。

sentences.english: Is China going to repatriate these North Koreans within the Chinese territory?
sentences.chinese: 中国是否会将中国境内的朝鲜人遣返回国？

sentences.english: Get our trip-wire troops out of there and let the Koreas solve this damn problem themselves.
sentences.chinese: 把我们的部队撤出来吧，让朝鲜人自己解决问题。

definition: Korean Goryeo dynasty, 918-1392/Korea, esp. in context of art and culture
North Korea/Korea as geographic term/Taiwan pr. [Chao2 xian1]
Hanseong, former name of Seoul (capital of South Korea), replaced in 2005 with 首爾|首尔[Shou3 er3]
